verbLexeme: 2. (With tongue extended), to lick an ice-cream cone.
nominalLexeme: 1. A very cold, sweet-tasting food made from milk and cream. English = ice-cream.
2. A serve of ice-cream on the end of a soft thin biscuit shaped like a cone. Australian English = ice-cream cone.
3. A very cold, sweet-tasting food made from water and sugar. English = ice-block, icy-pole.
oldEntry: Popular explanation: moving the ice-cream cone past the mouth.
